component.name: ColorHug2 Device Update
component.summary: Firmware for the Hughski ColorHug2 Colorimeter

description.p: Updating the firmware on your ColorHug2 device improves performance and adds new features.
This stable release fixes the following problems:

ul.li: Fix the swapped LEDs on batch 16
Make the self test more sensitive to detect floating pins

description.p: This stable release fixes the following problems:

ul.li: Use a quicker start-up sequence to fix flashing on Windows
Work around the MCDC04 errata when doing XYZ and non-XYZ measurements

description.p: This unstable release adds the following features:

ul.li: Use TakeReadings() to do a quick non-adaptive measurement
Scale XYZ measurement with a constant factor to make the CCMX more sane
